title: Moodle Resource Developer
job_overview:
We’re seeking a skilled Moodle Resource Developer to support the creation and contextualisation of learning materials within our Moodle platform. This role involves uploading and organising content, creating interactive assessments (e.g. quizzes, drop-downs), aligning resources with course objectives, and developing engaging presentation slides to enhance the learner experience.
